topics.body:
For those wondering what I originally wrote, basically furries and monster high fans are getting butthurt about the monster girls page on kym having such high positivity and them not being included.
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a39c463687238de100000#post_548a39c463687238de100000
[bq="trashboat"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a37e163687260e3270000#post_548a37e163687260e3270000
I for one don't want monster girls to be associated with the furry fandom.[/bq]
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a3a5b636872609f190000#post_548a3a5b636872609f190000
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a39c463687238de100000#post_548a39c463687238de100000
I don't see the differece of both things.[/bq]
Reason why those wanting monster girls, nekomimi and such to be counted as the same thing as furries is a bad idea summarized as succinctly as humanly possible:  nekomimi and monster girls are drastically more popular than furries so if they were counted as furries and assimilated into the furry fandom it would be the death of anthros completely.

Basically if nekomimi and monster girls were merged with furries say on furaffinity the next day anthros would be completely gone; there would no longer be any sonic art, no more digimon art, no more pokemon art, no more starfox or such all there would be is nekomimi.  So yeah the people who want it to be counted as part of the furry fandom are complete and utter morons.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a3b8e6368721aa4040000#post_548a3b8e6368721aa4040000
Okay, my mom's poodle is a few days from labor at most. And she wants me to help.
What the hell do I do?!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548a3bc76368726db15b0000#post_548a3bc76368726db15b0000
just keep your eye on the dog, keep towels and blankets around
when she goes into labour, she will start breathing heavily
she will do most of the work, so you just need to watch that the puppies are okay

just don't panic, it's not really difficult
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a
